headline: DE August PV auction clears at €53/MWh; BESS co-location pilot noted
summary_80w: BNetzA's latest utility-scale PV round saw moderate undersubscription; select sites trial co-location rules, paving way for PV+BESS revenue stacking.

headline: India SECI issues 1.5 GW PV + 3 GWh BESS hybrid RfS across multiple states
summary_80w: RfS targets round-the-clock supply windows with storage minimums; viability gap vs. ALMM/BCD mitigations under review.

headline: EU consults on storage in capacity mechanisms; state-aid clarity for hybrids
summary_80w: Commission draft expands technology-neutral design; hybrid PV+Wind+BESS eligible with locational caps tied to grid constraints.
